text:
`group.translations|pprint` outputs
```(SizeLimitingPyMap: {fr-ca=1234567890, language: fr-ca, masterId: 0987654321})```
`group.translations` outputs
```{fr-ca=1234567890, language: fr-ca, masterId: 0987654321}```
`group.translations['fr-ca']` outputs nothing

`{% for lang in group.translations %} {{ lang }} {% endfor %}` outputs
```1234567890, language: fr-ca, masterId: 0987654321```
What?
